original_text: And the king answered and said unto the man of God, Intreat now the face of the Lord thy God, and pray for me, that my hand may be restored me again. And the man of God besought the Lord, and the king's hand was restored him again, and became as it was before.
korean_text: 왕이 하나님의 사람에게 말하여 이르되 청하건대 너는 나를 위하여 네 하나님 여호와께 은혜를 구하여 내 손이 다시 성하게 기도하라 하나님의 사람이 여호와께 은혜를 구하니 왕의 손이 다시 성하도록 전과 같이 되니라

sentences.original_text: and said unto the man of God
Intreat now the face of the Lord thy God
that my hand may be restored to me again
sentences.korean_translation: 내 손이 다시 나에게 회복되게 하기 위함이라

sentences.original_text: And the man of God besought the Lord
and the king's hand was restored to him again
and became as it was before
